title: THe 10 placement games are bugged
body:
Last season i was silver 5 my friend silver 4 then when the new season started i played my 10 games and got placed in b 5 like my friend then i climbed to b5 with 100lp in the promos.it was my second time in the promos so i had to win only one game to get b 4 . then riot updated that you have to play one more game i don't know why....... i did it i even won it but i got played in b 5 with 0 lp so i basically lost 100lp for a win.
pls text me back and help me understand what happened.....
